dc_description_s: Hand colored.; Relief shown pictorially.; Title cartouche in upper right.; Cartouche in lower center: "Sumptibus et typis...Joannis Janssonij, Amsterdam."; Illustrated borders showing inhabitants in typical apparel.; Six insets in top border showing cities: Alcair -- Alexandria -- Alger --Tunis -- Tanger -- Ceuta.|50 x 35 centimeters|Scale not given|General Map Collection
